name: Rusted Warfare (1.13)Modded By TanKKH V2
description:
模组版本第二代，以其他模组版本不同的是，在不失去原版风格的情况下丰富游戏的内容。让游戏更为好玩和精彩。大部分模组单位和第一代不同。两者版本可共存。

—增加各种平衡的兵种，建筑，地图 —支持联机（需要同样版本）

注意：此为开放源码应用，原作者拥有所有的版权。部分资源从网上取得，禁止售卖！

——————————————————————————————————————————

游戏推荐短片由官方制作，不含模组。若有能力请尽量支持正版。

The game recommendation video is made by the official and does not contain modules. Please support original publication as you can.

——————————————————————————————————————————

This is the module version V2, unlike other module versions, enriches the game without losing the original style. Make the game more fun and exciting.Most of the module units are different from the first version.Both versions can coexist.

- Increased variety of balanced arms, buildings, maps - Support multiplayer (requires the same version)

Note: This is an open source application and the original author owns all copyrights. Some resources are obtained from the Internet and sales are prohibited!
